name: ShuAke Dating Sim
description:
Have you ever wanted to be Joker and date Goro Akechi?! (No? well, I don't care!)

In this game, now you're able to do it. Go on exciting dates with the Detective Prince and try your best to make him happy. 

Featuring:

  • Goro Akechi AKA Akechi AKA Crow AKA Pancake Prince from the acclaimed Persona 5 Royal game, the definitive way to play the original acclaimed Persona 5 game by Atlus.
  • Other people I guess.

I don't know what you're waiting for. Download the game and date him. Now.

DISCLAIMER:

All assets used in this game are property of Atlus. I don't own the characters, nor the art, nor the music. This is supposed to be a parody game (AKA a shitpost). Enjoy.
